metadata.title: CVE-2022-48820 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phy: stm32: fix a refcount leak in stm32_usbphyc_pll_enable()This error path needs to decrement "usbphyc->n_pll_cons.counter" beforereturning.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
